subtasks.title: Substituir input de email pelo componente Input

subtasks.notes: Successfully replaced the inline email input with the Input component. All required props are configured: label='Email', id='email', name='email', type='email', autoComplete='email', required, placeholder='seu@email.com'. The wrapper div structure has been simplified and the label is now integrated via the Input component's label prop.

acceptance_criteria: Campo de senha usa o componente Input

subtasks.notes: Successfully replaced the inline password input with the Input component. All required props are configured: label='Senha', id='password', name='password', type='password', autoComplete='current-password', required, placeholder='Sua senha'. The wrapper div structure has been simplified and the label is now integrated via the Input component's label prop. Both email and password fields now consistently use the Input component.
